For some more background you might want  to visit the following bug report:  https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=338621  --> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="/WebResource.axd?d=OG6ICBS3XdykvyL_wBngEtwfPZ1xqVL3SJbFznhjfEgbO7QCYjHbDfgdgnO_5IYl31FcIeZ2u_qHqs8zCgU_y6DDpKxLyAV4MxNJVxfxbqAA9wnJHfwytgbvEYfRnFp2CKySbJEfaqzaXNpSNK6oTGhGshY1&t=635319500310794128" media="screen"?> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/" xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/">   <title>China Policy Institute</title>   <subtitle>China Policy Institute</subtitle>   <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/CPI/index.aspx?schoolHomepageEvents_StandardList_SyndicationType=2" />   <generator>Contensis: http://www.contentmanagement.co.uk</generator>   <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/CPI/index.aspx?SyndicationType=2</id>   <updated>2015-03-12T01:25:21Z</updated>   <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/CPI/index.aspx?SyndicationType=2" rel="self" type="application/atom+xml" />   <entry>     <title>Joint Conference: The Silk Road Heritage in Asia's Imagined Futures</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/cpi/news-events/events/silk-road-event-14-5-2015.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Hua Geddes</name>     </author>     <summary>This conference, jointed organised by HH Sheikh Nasser al-Mohammad al-Sabah Programme at Durham University adn the China Policy Institute at the University of Nottingham aims to examine China's New Silk Road initiative in historical perspective.</summary>     <published>2015-03-10T15:14:00Z</published>     <updated>2015-03-11T14:49:00Z</updated>     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/cpi/news-events/events/silk-road-event-14-5-2015.aspx</id>     <category term="silk road" />     <category term="China Dream" />     <category term="China policy institute" />     <category term="Joint conference" />   </entry> </feed>
